attributes.action: Recognise Advanced Nurse Practitioners as playing a crucial role within the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
The Advanced Nurse Practitioner role encompasses:-
● Making autonomous decisions for which they are accountable 
● Treating patients with undifferentiated and undiagnosed problems and making an assessment of their health care needs based on physical examination, diagnosis, prescribing and referring 
● Ordering necessary clinical investigations
● Making differential diagnoses using decision-making and problem-solving skills
Ref: https://www.rcn.org.uk/__data/assets/pdf_file/0003/146478/003207.pdf
attributes.background: Advanced Nurse Practitioners are highly skilled, experienced clinicians educated to Masters level. They have played a crucial part in addressing the GP shortages within the NHS, yet the Government appears to have overlooked this. We seek funding of further ANP posts nationally and role recognition.
